name: Max Reloaded II
summary: The city is under siege as the full force of enemy combatant ravaging what remains of a broken and beaten law enforcements. Responding to S.O.S, Max travels through time to confront all of them... In a world where Bionic man meets fantasy-fiction and advanced technology is mixed with psycho-powers. Features ✪ Frantic Arcade-Style Action - Fight your way through 30 nightmarish missions and finally challenge the boss! ✪ Various Environments and Secrets - Unleash mayhem in the city. Discover secrets cache of treasures hidden in the fray! ✪ Special Weapons and Power-Ups - Lay waste and Wreak havoc with a huge arsenal of weapons including Grenades, Shotgun, Rocket Launcher, Miniguns! ✪ Vehicle controls - Unlock jump-jets. Drive cars, tanks, helicopters, and planes in the game! ✪ Destructions - destructible buildings and cars! ✪ Manipulate time - slow time to fight the army of minions in style!
